import java.io.*;

class TECH09 
{
	static String getSequence(int pos)
	{
		String seq="zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba";
		return seq.substring(seq.length()-1-pos, seq.length());
	}
	public static void main(String args[]) throws IOException
	{
		BufferedReader in=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		PrintWriter out=new PrintWriter(System.out);
		int tests=Integer.parseInt(in.readLine());
		for(int i=0;i<tests;i++)
		{
			int lim=Integer.parseInt(in.readLine());
			String output="";
			if(lim>25)
			{
				int rem=lim%25;
				lim=lim/25;
				if(rem>0)
				{
					output=getSequence(rem);
				}
				for(int j=0;j<lim;j++)
				{
					output+=getSequence(25);
				};
			}
			else
				output=getSequence(lim);
			out.println(output);
			out.flush();
		}
	}
}
